title: Cool Energy Storage
description: Designed and prototyped a Cool Thermal Energy Storage (CTES) system using water's latent heat for solar energy storage
what: Design and prototype a Cool Thermal Energy Storage (CTES) system for solar energy storage using water's latent heat of fusion.
how: Used Autodesk Inventor for design, MATLAB and Ansys CFX for technical analysis, and custom-built a data logger and controller for accurate monitoring and control.
result: Improved CTES system efficiency by 250% through advanced analysis and optimisation.
Delivered a validated prototype with accurate performance monitoring and user-friendly control.
